Posts.Content: it is very hard to explain the visual problems i am experiencing. i am not sure if its the medicines i am taking, dehydration, or the lighting at work. its kind of a dizzy haze and a sensitivity to light. i am taking arimidex, effexor xr, fosamax, lovastatin, ambien. my eyes are fine acccording to the doctor, just some dry eyes. i am using drops for that. its driving me crazy at work. has anyone had this problem? please help
Posts.Title: visual haze, sensitivity to light
